member.name: T:Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.CurrentACS712
member.summary: A CurrentACS712 module for Microsoft .NET Gadgeteer

member.name: M:Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.CurrentACS712.#ctor(System.Int32)
member.param: The socket that this module is plugged in to.

member.name: M:Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.CurrentACS712.ReadACCurrent(System.Int32)
member.summary: Reads the alternating current value using an average of multiple samples.
member.param: The number of times to sample the sensor.

member.name: M:Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.CurrentACS712.ReadDCCurrent(System.Int32)
member.summary: Reads the direct current value using an average of multiple samples.
member.param: The number of times to sample the sensor.
